participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Caring and reflective, Alex values her personal time and health amidst a busy lifestyle.
participant_1.background: I'm a busy person, but I make sure to take time for myself to maintain my health. I am hoping to play. I am thin. My mom was a hairdresser. I don't talk about my parents.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Enthusiastic and social, Jordan enjoys celebrating life with friends and values honesty in relationships.
participant_2.background: I took a spin in my Toyota Land Cruiser before heading to my favorite dance club to celebrate my birthday. I will graduate from college in two years. I value honesty in a relationship, and I want my partner to be supportive of my passions. I loved playing in the rain with my friends, even though we would get soaked. I have taken formal music lessons since I was 5.

content.text: Hi, I'm doing well, thanks for asking. How are you?
I'm pretty good, thanks! I'm just getting ready for my birthday party tonight.
Oh, that sounds exciting! What are you planning on doing?
I'm going to go to my favorite dance club with some friends. I'm really excited to celebrate with them.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I hope you have a great time.
So, what are you studying in college?
I'm studying business. I'm hoping to get a job in marketing after I graduate.
That's great! I'm sure you'll do great.
So, do you have any hobbies?
I love to play music. I've been taking formal music lessons since I was 5 years old.
That's awesome! What kind of music do you play?
I play the piano and the guitar. I also sing.
That's really cool! I used to play the piano when I was younger, but I don't really play anymore.
Oh, that's too bad. You should pick it back up!
I'm sure you'd be great at it.
